Container.Name: AI-Chief-of-Staff
Container.Overview:
AI Chief of Staff - Your intelligent executive assistant powered by Claude AI. Automatically extracts commitments, action items, follow-ups, and risks from meeting transcripts. Integrates with Google Calendar, generates weekly reports, and provides mobile PWA with push notifications.
ðŸ†• MICROSERVICES ARCHITECTURE: This version supports optional microservices for enhanced AI features: - AI Intelligence Service (Python/FastAPI) - Advanced task analysis - Pattern Recognition Service - Behavioral insights - NL Parser - Natural language processing - Voice Processor - Audio transcription - Context Service (Go) - High-performance context retrieval
DEPLOYMENT OPTIONS: 1. Standalone Mode: Run as single container (default, simpler) 2. Microservices Mode: Use docker-compose for full architecture
Core Features: - Automatic transcript processing and task extraction - Intelligent deadline assignment based on urgency - Google Calendar integration with detailed event descriptions - Weekly executive briefs and pattern detection - Mobile-responsive PWA with offline support - Push notifications for overdue tasks - Customizable AI prompts - PostgreSQL or SQLite database support
Requirements: - Anthropic API key (for AI features) - PostgreSQL database (recommended) or SQLite - Redis (optional, for microservices caching) - Optional: Google Calendar OAuth for calendar integration - Optional: VAPID keys for push notifications
For microservices setup, see: https://github.com/JoshuaSeidel/plaud-ai-chief-of-staff/blob/main/unraid/MICROSERVICES-SETUP.md
Container.Requires: PostgreSQL database (use separate PostgreSQL container or external server). Optional: Redis for microservices caching.

Config.Name: WebUI Port
Config.Description: Web interface port

Config.Name: App Data
Config.Description: Configuration files, logs, and SQLite database (if used)

Config.Name: Uploads
Config.Description: Uploaded transcript files

Config.Name: Database Type
Config.Description: Database type: 'postgres' (recommended) or 'sqlite'

Config.Name: PostgreSQL Host
Config.Description: PostgreSQL hostname or IP (e.g., 192.168.1.10 or postgres)

Config.Name: PostgreSQL Port
Config.Description: PostgreSQL port

Config.Name: PostgreSQL Database
Config.Description: PostgreSQL database name

Config.Name: PostgreSQL User
Config.Description: PostgreSQL username

Config.Name: PostgreSQL Password
Config.Description: PostgreSQL password

Config.Name: AI Intelligence URL
Config.Description: AI Intelligence service URL (optional, e.g., http://192.168.1.10:8001). Leave blank for standalone mode.

Config.Name: Pattern Recognition URL
Config.Description: Pattern Recognition service URL (optional, e.g., http://192.168.1.10:8002)

Config.Name: NL Parser URL
Config.Description: Natural Language Parser service URL (optional, e.g., http://192.168.1.10:8003)

Config.Name: Voice Processor URL
Config.Description: Voice Processor service URL (optional, e.g., http://192.168.1.10:8004)

Config.Name: Context Service URL
Config.Description: Context Service URL (optional, e.g., http://192.168.1.10:8005)

Config.Name: Redis URL
Config.Description: Redis URL for caching (optional, e.g., redis://192.168.1.10:6379). Required if using microservices.

Config.Name: Anthropic API Key
Config.Description: Anthropic Claude API key (required for AI features). Get from: https://console.anthropic.com

Config.Name: OpenAI API Key
Config.Description: OpenAI API key (optional, for voice transcription with Whisper)

Config.Name: Google Redirect URI
Config.Description: Google OAuth redirect URI (e.g., https://aicos.yourdomain.com/api/calendar/google/callback). Leave blank if not using SWAG.

Config.Name: VAPID Public Key
Config.Description: VAPID public key for push notifications. Generate with: npx web-push generate-vapid-keys

Config.Name: VAPID Private Key
Config.Description: VAPID private key for push notifications

Config.Name: VAPID Subject
Config.Description: VAPID subject (email address)

Config.Name: Node Environment
Config.Description: Node.js environment (production recommended)

Config.Name: PUID
Config.Description: User ID for file permissions

Config.Name: PGID
Config.Description: Group ID for file permissions
